title: Can't copy/paste into VNC connection
author: SPIKE-NZ
body_snippet:
When connected to VNC session, pasting does not work. 

## Expected Behavior
Connections to VNC session should be able to copy and paste to and from them? As stand-alone VNC applications support such as tight VNC. 


## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1.  Any connection to VNC. 

## Your Environment
Windows 10 1803 64x
MremoteNG version:  1.76.11
Connected to SQL database

comments.snippet: have you tried to use external application as vnc connection?
comments.author: mrPsycho
